transArray.content: The parking at the hotel is free, the room facilities are complete, the service is very friendly, the breakfast is also very good, fruit drinks are given for check-in, and oranges are provided all day long, it is a very good hotel!

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital, the subway and the bus station, and the hotel provides electronic parking coupons for free parking. Travel routes can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is fully equipped with electric curtains, refrigerated refrigerators, and snacks and fresh oranges are provided at the front desk. I hope it can bring you good memories and sincere expectations. Every time you visit! I wish you all the best. Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
